alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; St. Landry; St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:04AM CDT until April 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro. * WHEN...Until Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.5 feet, Arnaudville Road and Magellan road intersection begins to flood from Coulee Lantier. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Sunday was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday morning and continue falling to 13.7 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Bayou Vermilion Carencro 17.0 19.0 Sun 8 am CDT 18.2 17.0 15.7 &&
